Biography / Description

With over 50 years in the international moving industry, Asya International Movers is Turkeyâ€™s largest household goods removals & mobility Solution Company. Headquartered in Istanbul, with warehouses in Ankara, Adana and Izmir to service Turkey in entirety, we are FIDI-FAIM plus & ISO 9001 certified and affiliated with OMNI, One-Group, ICEFAT, and IAM.

A sister company, Bedel Mobility Solutions, was also established to provide relocation services & visa and immigration services throughout Turkey. Our experienced staff is experts in household goods moving and relocation services and is providing world-class customer service to our clientele.
